49.ara-name: كتاب المناقب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ali bin Abi Talib:"I never heard the Prophet (ﷺ) mentioning both of his parents being ransomed for anyone except for Sa'd. On the Day of Uhud, I heard him saying: 'Shoot, Sa'd, may my father and mother be ransomed for you
